alert.note: Alert for North Snowy Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued January 10 at 2:59AM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TUESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...North Snowy Range Foothills including Interstate 80 near Arlington and Elk Mountain. * WHEN...From this evening through late Tuesday night. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.
